languages.text: "Защиту. Не военную защиту, но безопасность иного рода. Вы, конечно, уже столкнулись с проблемами при навигации в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}, прибыв к нам. Проблемы, к сожалению, не местного характера. Сообщения о нарушенных маршрутах и сгинувших в коротком прыжке кораблях приходят со всего сектора".

traits.locale_text: "Защиту. Не военную защиту, но безопасность иного рода. Вы, конечно, уже столкнулись с проблемами при навигации в варпе, прибыв к нам. Проблемы, к сожалению, не местного характера. Сообщения о нарушенных маршрутах и сгинувших в коротком прыжке кораблях приходят со всего сектора".

languages.text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."
languages.original_text: "Защиту. Не военную защиту, но безопасность иного рода. Вы, конечно, уже столкнулись с проблемами при навигации в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}, прибыв к нам. Проблемы, к сожалению, не местного характера. Сообщения о нарушенных маршрутах и сгинувших в коротком прыжке кораблях приходят со всего сектора".

traits.locale_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with warp navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are arriving from the entire sector."

"Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with warp navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are arriving from the entire sector."

I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

"Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

languages.text: 「守りだ。軍事的な守りではなく、別種類の安全保障。当然、ここに来る途中の{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航行で困ったことが起きただろう。残念ながら、こういった問題の範囲は、この地域からずっと先にまで及んでいる。航路の混乱やショートジャンプ中の船の消滅報告が全領域から入っているんだ」
languages.original_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

traits.locale_text: 「守りだ。軍事的な守りではなく、別種類の安全保障。当然、ここに来る途中の{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航行で困ったことが起きただろう。残念ながら、こういった問題の範囲は、この地域からずっと先にまで及んでいる。航路の混乱やショートジャンプ中の船の消滅報告が全領域から入っているんだ」

languages.text: “庇护，但并不是军事保护，而是另一种形式的安全保障。在您来这里的路上，想必您已经遇到了{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}导航的问题。恐怕这些问题远远超出了这个地区能解决的范畴。整个扩区都传来了相关报告，说航线中断，或是舰船在短途跳跃期间不知所踪。”
languages.original_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

traits.locale_text: “庇护，但并不是军事保护，而是另一种形式的安全保障。在您来这里的路上，想必您已经遇到了{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}导航的问题。恐怕这些问题远远超出了这个地区能解决的范畴。整个扩区都传来了相关报告，说航线中断，或是舰船在短途跳跃期间不知所踪。”

languages.text: «Protección. No de índole militar, sino de otra distinta. Usted, por supuesto, sabe de primera mano lo difícil que es navegar por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} hasta aquí. Tengo miedo de que la dimensión de estas dificultades se extienda por este área. Nos llegan informes de rutas cortadas y naves desaparecidas en saltos cortos de todo el sector».
languages.original_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

traits.locale_text: «Protección. No de índole militar, sino de otra distinta. Usted, por supuesto, sabe de primera mano lo difícil que es navegar por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} hasta aquí. Tengo miedo de que la dimensión de estas dificultades se extienda por este área. Nos llegan informes de rutas cortadas y naves desaparecidas en saltos cortos de todo el sector».

languages.text: « J'aimerais bénéficier de votre protection. Je ne parle pas d'une protection militaire, mais d'un autre genre de sécurité. En chemin, vous avez certainement rencontré des difficultés en matière de navigation dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, mais j'ai bien peur que ces problèmes touchent beaucoup d'autres zones, au-delà de la nôtre. On nous signale des routes interrompues et des disparitions de vaisseaux lors de sauts très courts dans tout le secteur. »
languages.original_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais bénéficier de votre protection. Je ne parle pas d'une protection militaire, mais d'un autre genre de sécurité. En chemin, vous avez certainement rencontré des difficultés en matière de navigation dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, mais j'ai bien peur que ces problèmes touchent beaucoup d'autres zones, au-delà de la nôtre. On nous signale des routes interrompues et des disparitions de vaisseaux lors de sauts très courts dans tout le secteur. »

languages.text: "Schutz. Nicht militärischer Art, sondern eine andere Sicherheit. Ihr hattet natürlich auf dem Herweg bereits Schwierigkeiten mit der Navigation im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Ich fürchte, das Ausmaß dieser Schwierigkeiten erstreckt sich weit über dieses Gebiet hinaus. Wir erhalten Berichte über gestörte Routen und bei kurzen Sprüngen verschwundene Schiffe aus dem gesamten Sektor."
languages.original_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

traits.locale_text: "Schutz. Nicht militärischer Art, sondern eine andere Sicherheit. Ihr hattet natürlich auf dem Herweg bereits Schwierigkeiten mit der Navigation im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Ich fürchte, das Ausmaß dieser Schwierigkeiten erstreckt sich weit über dieses Gebiet hinaus. Wir erhalten Berichte über gestörte Routen und bei kurzen Sprüngen verschwundene Schiffe aus dem gesamten Sektor."

languages.text: "Koruma. Lakin askerî türden değil de daha farklı bir emniyet. Buraya gelirken {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} rotalarındaki zorluklarla karşılaşmışsınızdır elbet. Ne yazık ki bu güçlüklerin kapsamı, bu bölgenin çok ötesine uzanıyor. Sektörün tamamından bozulan rotalar ve kısa sıçramalar sırasında dahi kaybolan gemilerin raporları geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Protection. Not military protection, but a different kind of security. You have, of course, already encountered difficulties with {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} navigation on your way here. I'm afraid the scope of these difficulties extends far beyond this area. Reports of disrupted routes and ships vanishing during short jumps are coming in from across the entire sector."

traits.locale_text: "Koruma. Lakin askerî türden değil, farklı bir koruma... Buraya gelirken {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} rotalarındaki zorlukları görmüşsünüzdür elbet. Korkarım bu güçlüklerin kapsamı, bu alanın çok ötesine uzanıyor. Bozulan rotalar ve kısa atlamalar sırasında dahi kaybolan gemilerin raporları geliyor tüm sektörden."
